title: Pathophysiology, Pharmacology and Nursing Practice III
description:
This module allows students to integrate knowledge of
pathophysiology, health assessment, principles of
medical and nursing management and pharmacology
related to neurological and haem-oncological conditions
and to patients requiring emergency or critical care
management. Students will also develop critical thinking
skills through conducting health assessment, interpreting
results of diagnostic investigations and problem-solving.
department: Alice Lee Center for Nursing Studies
faculty: Yong Loo Lin Sch of Medicine
